author: Channing Centeno
description: This riff on a Final Ward is both bitter sweet and sweet 'n' sour. It's challenging, complex and a most interesting example of inspired bartending creativity.
name: Wild Ward
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
